entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening and 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
